Package com.djrapitops.plan.storage.database.transactions.init

Class OperationCriticalTransaction

java.lang.Object
com.djrapitops.plan.storage.database.transactions.Transaction
com.djrapitops.plan.storage.database.transactions.init.OperationCriticalTransaction
Direct Known Subclasses:
CreateTablesTransaction, Patch
public abstract class OperationCriticalTransaction extends Transaction
Transaction that is required to be executed before a database is operable.

If this transaction fails the database failed to open.
